posts.title: Understanding Vue.js
posts.body: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework used for building user interfaces. It focuses on the view layer and is easy to integrate with other libraries or existing projects.

posts.title: Getting Started with Vue Router
posts.body: Vue Router is the official router for Vue.js. It enables navigation between different components and provides features such as route parameters and nested routes.

posts.title: Vuex: State Management in Vue
posts.body: Vuex is a state management library for Vue.js applications. It serves as a centralized store for all components in an application, ensuring that the state remains predictable.

posts.title: Building a Simple Blog with Vue
posts.body: In this tutorial, we will build a simple blog application using Vue.js and JSON server. We'll learn how to create, read, update, and delete posts.

posts.title: Deploying Vue Applications
posts.body: Once you've built your Vue application, deploying it to production is straightforward. This article will guide you through the steps of deploying a Vue app.
